summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2012 FORD FIESTA. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING AT VARIOUS SPEEDS, THE VEHICLE STALLED UPON DEPRESSING THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL. ADDITIONALLY, WHILE STOPPED AND ATTEMPTING TO MOVE OFF FROM THE STOPPED POSITION, THE VEHICLE ROLLED BACKWARDS BEFORE THE TRANSMISSION ENGAGED WITH THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL DEPRESSED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WAS A HESITATION BEFORE THE VEHICLE RESPONDED WHEN THE ACCELERATOR PEDAL WAS DEPRESSED. THE CONTACT STATED THAT THERE WERE NO WARNING LIGHTS ILLUMINATED. A DEALER WAS NOT CONTACTED. THE VEHICLE WAS NOT TAKEN TO BE DIAGNOSED NOR REPAIRED. THE MANUFACTURER WAS NOTIFIED OF THE FAILURE. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS 88,500.
